Burning Hammer: Well, I'm going to leave that your choice, I think the Alli=
ance is the obvious choice right now...



  ----- Original Message ----- 
=
    From: Rudra656@... 
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Tuesd=
ay, October 16, 2001 7:37 AM
    Subject: Re: Finally, the Gunslinger, has =
come back! To NBW...


    ::Lambda::
         "We could always go back to =
the Alliance.  I doubt any of them ever noticed that we were gone.  On the =
other hand We might want to check out some of the groups that attacked.  Th=
ey were a fierce bunch."  She leans against the side of the ship.
